2. space space 3 left parenthesis negative 1 right parenthesis plus cross times space equals negative cross times plus 7
space space space space space space space space 3 cross times negative 3 plus cross times equals negative cross times plus 7
space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space 4 cross times negative 3 space equals space minus cross times plus 7
space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space 4 cross times equals space minus cross times equals 7 plus 3
space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space 4 cross times equals negative cross times space plus space 10
space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space 5 cross times equals space 10
space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space space cross times equals space 10 over 5 equals 2
